Reviews.Title: “Better experience than expected!”
Reviews.Author: travelingK7863
Reviews.Content: returned visit montreal heard questionable hotel read reviews website heard tip renovated arrival girl front desk newly renovated 6th floor polite friendly told gladly switched beds little hard own memory bed hotel bed hard staff hotel extremely friendly helpful wait staff quick smile courteous plus accommodating switching english discovered french awful overall pleasant experience gladly stay

Reviews.Title: “Good business hotel for the east side of Montreal”

Reviews.Content: enjoyed 2 nights week business montreal east access sherbrooke st est decent restaurants located 10 minute walk hotel restaurant quality typically priced convenience stayed 6th floor renovated euro style recently enjoyed amazing sunrise east morning
